Status Indicator

Status column always should be the first column of any table.

Color Usage

Used to signify when something is overdue or needs immediate attention.

Status - Bright Green

Confirmed or Completed, Used to signify a state that all action required has been completed.

Status - Bright Blue

Used to signify a positive state wating for an action to become Confirmed or Completed.

Assigned
Status - Bright Orange

Used to signify a state that is pending, waiting for CEMEX to confirm information, or payment to process

Pending
In Progress
Status - Inactive Grey

Used to signify when something is in-active, disabled, or not needing immediate attention
